title: Add Guarantor to Patient Account
description: A pediatric patient is being seen, and their parent needs to be added as the financial guarantor for the account.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the child's patient chart.

tasks.description: Create a new person record for the parent (guarantor) or link to their existing record if they are also a patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates or finds the guarantor's record.

tasks.description: Link the guarantor's record to the patient's account and designate them as financially responsible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully establishes the patient-guarantor relationship for billing purposes.
